attributes.action: Stop employer's from claiming back over payments
attributes.additional_details: Employer's should not be able to claim back over payments. This situation only occurs though fault of the employer. Employees should not be held responsible for financial faults of the employer. These situations can cause serious financial issues and affect mental health the employer should be held responsible for its own financial mistakes
attributes.background: Employer's should not be able to claim back over payments. This situation only occurs though fault of the employer. Employees should not be held responsible for financial faults of the employer

rejection.details:
Parliament or Government is not responsible for the way a individual organisation recoups any money it may have over-paid in a salary instalment.

You can find out more about what to do if an employer has overpaid you here:
https://www.acas.org.uk/check-if-your-employer-can-make-deductions-from-your-wages
https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/work/leaving-a-job/resigning/if-your-employer-says-you-owe-them-money/
